id3TagStuff
Class ID3v2_XTagHeader

java.lang.Object
  id3TagStuff.ID3v2_XTagHeader

public class ID3v2_XTagHeader
extends java.lang.Object

A ID3v2_XTagHeader represents the first few (10) bytes in an ID3 tag.

Author:
Justin Nelson

Creates an ID3v2_XTagHeader given the byte array

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the header bytes given is not ten bytes long, or the first three bytes aren't id3
